entries.confirm_accept: Are you sure you want to accept this mission?
entries.confirm_create: Are you sure you want to create this mission?
entries.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this mission?
entries.create_bond: The mission taker must put up a bond of:
entries.create_bounty: The mission taker will incur a bounty of
entries.create_completion: The mission must be completed in
entries.create_deadline: The mission must be completed by
entries.create_declared: The mission taker must belong to this faction
entries.create_friends: The mission taker must be on my friends list
entries.create_limit: ...and the mission must be completed within
entries.create_err_no_from: You need to specify where "From" location for this mission.
entries.create_err_no_target: You need to specify a "target" for the mission.
entries.create_err_no_to: You need to specify a destination location  for the mission!
entries.create_pa: The mission taker must be in my player association.
entries.create_payment: Payment upon completion of the mission will be:
entries.err_invalid_bond: The bond amount for this mission is  not valid!
entries.err_invalid_deadline: The deadline for this mission is not valid!
entries.err_invalid_limit: The specified time limit for this mission is not valid!
entries.err_invalid_payment: The payment amount for this mission  isn't valid!
entries.err_invalid_target_quantity: The target quantity for this mission isn't  valid!
entries.err_limit_greater_deadline: The time limit for this mission exceeds  the deadline!
entries.no_mission_selected: You need to select a mission.
entries.help_details_info: Critical information about the mission.  This might include the name of the target, the distance, and the difficulty.  Difficulty is a numeric value, in which a higher value corresponds to a more difficult mission.
entries.help_details_description: A detailed description of the mission.
entries.help_accept: Click this button to accept the mission.
entries.help_details_abort: Abort the mission and forfeit the reward.
entries.help_details_waypoint: Show or hide the waypoint for this mission.
entries.help_browser_table: This is the Mission Browser.  You can view and accept missions here.  This table lists the current missions available for the selected category.  Click on the above tabs to change the current category.
entries.help_browser_refresh: View a different set of missions.  Doing so will remove the current missions from your list.
entries.help_browser_details: View the details of the currently selected mission.
